command: sudo iptables -A INPUT -p icmp --icmp-type echo-request -m length --length 96 -m recent --rcheck --seconds 15 --name T1205_K2 -m recent --name T1205_K3 --set -j LOG --log-prefix "T1205_KNOCK3 "
explanation: Final knock of a multi-protocol signaling chain: an ICMP echo-request of specific size within 15s of step 2, emulating covert multi-packet activation.
rationale_steps: Use an ICMP payload length constraint to encode a signaling feature.
Confirm proper sequence with recent before marking completion and logging.
